This hoodie is so beautiful. Love the material not too thick or hot material. You can wear it all day. Fits well, super soft and comfortable.

It’s very thick and good quality I loved it!!

I ordered this hoodie because it was listed as 100% cotton, this made me think that it would be super soft and comfortable but when it arrived it is really thick and the material isn’t very soft at all. Definitely not the best quality option

I am not a big fan of those softer hoodies because they pill and collect dust. This is a less soft fabric that feels high quality and does not pill. I got a large since I like my hoodies oversized, and I am so happy with the fit and the quality for the price.
This hoodie is thick, runs true to size and has a loose fit. It also has a slight stretch as well. It’s soft, warm and comfortable.

I got this product for my sister in law. It wasn’t what I had expected. It’s not your normal hoodie material. It was like soft like fleece. It also was more brown than the picture shows. I got it specifically because it was lighter, but it did not come that way
